content.text: Hey! I'm from California. Where are you from?
I'm from the Bay Area! What part of Cali are you from?
I live in LA. I'm an artist and work as a vet assistant. What do you do?
I'm a student at Berkeley and work as a barista. I love my job, but I'm getting tired of school.
I'm sorry to hear that. It's hard to find a job you love.
It's not all bad. I love learning and I love my friends and family.
I love to travel, read, and go to the movies. I'm also a huge fan of the Oakland A's.
I love to travel too! I've been to Europe and Asia. I'm not a big sports fan, but I love the San Jose Sharks.
I've always wanted to go to Europe. I'm a little scared of flying, but I'm sure I could do it.
I know! I'm planning a trip to Italy next year.
Oh, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Italy.
I'm so excited! I've been planning it for years.
You're going to have a great time.
